name: Total Labs
source_detail:
"Cumulative total tests completed (may count people more than once)"
"Cumulative negative tests (may count people more than once)"
source_desc: Shows the total number of labs done throughout the state. The number below is the total number of labs that came back negative.

name: Total Positive Labs
source_detail:
"Cumulative positive tests (may count people more than once)"
"Cumulative total tests completed (may count people more than once)"
source_desc: Shows the total number of labs that have had positive results. The number below shows the percent of all labs that had positive results.

name: Total People Tested
source_detail:
"Cumulative people tested (one count per person)"
"Cumulative people who have only tested negative (counts first negative lab per person)"
source_desc: Shows the total number of unique people who have been tested. The number below represents how many people have only tested negative.

name: Total People Positive
source_detail:
"Cumulative people who tested positive (counts first positive lab per person)"
"Cumulative people tested (one count per person)"
source_desc: Shows the total number of unique people who have tested positive. The number below shows the percent of all people tested who have had a positive results.

name: Total Deaths
source_desc: Shows the total number of current deaths in Rhode Island. The number below shows how many of those occured inside a hospital.

name: Total Hospital Admitted
source_desc: Shows the total number of people admitted and discharged from a hospital.

name: Total Fully Vaccinated
source_detail:
"Cumulative total number of people fully vaccinated",
"Cumulative total number of people at least partially vaccinated"
source_desc: Shows the total number of people who have been fully vaccinated and those who have been partially vaccinated.
